issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Remove usage of metrics v1 from hadoop-mapreduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Metrics tags were unintentionally removed by MAPREDUCE-6526. Let's add them back.

Thanks [~zsiegl] for the patch. The patch looks good to me with minor comments.

1) The description of the RECORD_INFO can be "Metrics for Shuffle client" instead of "Metrics for Shuffle Plugin"

2) TestShuffleClientMetrics.testCreate() can probably be renamed to testShuffleMetricsTag() or the like.

3) "shuffleClientMetrics.threadBusy();" is not necessary as part of the act step in the unit test given what the test is doing.

Thanks for the review [~haibochen]!

Good points, fixed the issues, new build is on the way.
+1 on the latest 02 patch pending jenkins.
